fliplet.title: Welcome to the login of this app
fliplet.instruction: Log in using your Fliplet access details.

login.loginFailed: Unable to login. Try again later.

restore.title: Forgot password
restore.instruction: Enter your email address below, and we will send you an email to reset your password.
restore.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.

verify.title: Verification
verify.instruction: A verification code was sent to .

reset.title: New password
reset.instruction: Enter and confirm your new password.

success.title: Password successfully reset
success.instruction: Your password was successfully reset. You can now log in using your new password.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.instruction: This extra step shows it's really you trying to log in
twoFactor.resendFailed: Unable to resend your code, try again later.

update.title: Your password needs to be updated
update.instruction: Your organization has updated its password policy and you will need to update your password to keep meeting the security requirements.

errors.verificationFailed: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.loginNotFinished: You didn't finish the login process.
errors.loginFailed: Login failed. Please try again later.
errors.unableLogin: Unable to login. Try again later.

warnings.noRedirectWithoutSecurity: Login verified. Redirection is disabled when security isn't enabled.
warnings.noRedirectWhenEditing: Login verified. Redirection is disabled when editing screens.

errorToast.loginFailed: There was an error logging in
